DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate new way create CT-like image intra-operative procedure . We want prove quality information receive DynaCT satisfactory implement stent-graft abdominal aortic aneurysm .
DOC.brief_title: DynaCT Imaging EVAR : Comparing Clinical Benefit DynaCT Multidetector CT Current Gold Standard .
